title: PRIMUS – all in one
description:
The PRIMUS – all in one is changing the state of the art. 
 It sets new standards in product safety, energy efficiency, eco-friendliness, and sustainability. 
 Gone are the days of complicated, time-consuming design and planning. 
 The PRIMUS – all in one combines dust collection with explosion and fire protection in a newly designed dust collection system with unparalleled energy efficiency and an innovative safety structure.

title: PRIMUS – Explosion and Fire Protection System
cate_info_ai: [{"catId":613790,"catPath":"Safety and rescue technology => Fire Protection => Fire Protection Systems => Fire Extinguishing Systems","catUrl":"https://vtyler.alibaba.com/vtyler/index.htm?categoryId=613790"}]
keyword_ai: {"keywords_english":{"1":"explosion protection system","2":"ATEX certified dust collector","3":"DEKRA tested safety"},"keywords":{"1":"explosion protection system","2":"ATEX certified dust collector","3":"DEKRA tested safety"}}
description:
The PRIMUS – all in one was designed for highly explosive dusts and successfully tested according to ATEX Directive 2014/34/EU. 
 Although we use advanced computer technology (including flow simulation) and comprehensive tests during development, when it comes to safety we don’t rely solely on theoretical approaches and our own experiments. In order to obtain independent proof that our dust collector is suitable for its intended use in potentially explosive atmospheres, we submitted it for examination to DEKRA Testing and Certification GmbH, a notified body in Germany. 
 DEKRA conducted explosion tests on the dust collection system without using additional autonomous protective systems. These tests were intended to assess whether the dust collector would withstand a potential explosion that could occur during its intended use without rupturing or creating reasonably foreseeable hazards to personnel, resulting from released flames and/or shock waves. Another objective was to evaluate whether a risk of flames and sparks escaping at the raw gas inlet is reasonably to be expected, which could lead to explosion propagation towards system components upstream of the dust collector. 
 Demonstration of performance 
 The testing body certified the following result: 
 The system is suitable without restrictions for light metal (aluminium, magnesium, etc.), metal, and organic dusts with KSt ≤ 500 bar*m/s. No hot surfaces were found. 
 The dust collection system can therefore be operated without additional autonomous protective systems (such as explosion venting devices according to EN 14797 or EN 14491) and without an explosion isolation system conforming to EN 15089 or EN 16447. 
 Using explosion suppression systems is no longer an economically feasible option either. 
 Rather than discussing problems on expert panels, we focus on finding solutions. 
 Gone are the days of complicated, time-consuming design and planning activities. 
 Calculations based on dust explosion characteristics – which, especially with metal dust, can be complicated and prone to errors – are no longer required. Design errors can result in the complete destruction of filter housings and in severe damage to the surrounding area. 
 Important notice: 
 Please note that extremely violent explosions can occur inside the housing even in case of small raw gas volumes (< 100 litres), especially when light metal dust is handled. Even though standards may have limited scopes of applicability, it would constitute gross negligence to assume that no explosion can occur if the raw gas volume is less than 100 litres. 
 For reasons of safety, we advise against collecting such dust in filter systems with large raw gas volumes (> 4,000 litres), as is sometimes considered. 
 The PRIMUS – all in one is currently the only system in which the raw gas volume remains constant as the air flow increases.

title: REXOFIL Primus
keyword_ai: {"keywords_english":{"3":"compact design","2":"remote maintenance","1":"Plug & Play dust extraction system"},"keywords":{"3":"kompakter Aufbau","2":"Fernwartung","1":"Plug & Play Entstaubungsanlage"}}
description:
Plug & Play 
 
 Maschine hinstellen und ausrichten (mittels integrierter Palette) 
 CEE-Stecker einstecken (16 oder 32 A; 5-polig; IP44) 
 Absaugrohr anschließen (DN 250 Jacobs) 
 Hauptschalter einschalten 
 
 und es kann losgehen. 
 Mit der Fernwartung (über Netzwerk oder GSM-Anbindung) alles im Blick 
 Alle relevanten Parameter der Entstaubungsanlage werden von uns permanent gemessen und auf einer Speicherkarte abgelegt. 
 Sämtliche Werte können über das Display oder per Fernwartung ab- oder ausgelesen werden. Dadurch kann die Historie der Absauganlage bei Bedarf jederzeit analysiert werden. 
 Ein eventuell erforderlicher Service wird dadurch mit wenig Aufwand für Sie und uns und zu entsprechend geringen Kosten möglich. 
 Wegen ihres kompakten Aufbaus sind alle Teile der Anlage für Wartungsarbeiten leicht zugänglich. Was wiederum die Kosten im Vergleich zu herkömmlichen Entstaubungsanlagen erheblich reduziert. 
 Selbstverständlich bieten wir auch kostengünstige Wartungsverträge an.

title: Technikum
cate_info_ai: [{"catId":616695,"catPath":"Measurement, testing and analysis services => Laboratories => Laboratories (Other)","catUrl":"https://vtyler.alibaba.com/vtyler/index.htm?categoryId=616695"}]
description:
Versuche, Messungen und Dokumentation in unserem umfangreich ausgestatteten Technikum. 
 Die Grundlagenforschung in unserem Technikum ist ein wichtige Vorrausetzung für die Innovationskraft von REXOFIL. Hier testen wir unsere Produkte auf Herz und Nieren. Wir untersuchen die Lebensdauer und Funktion der Filterelemente unter realen Bedingungen und mit unterschiedlichen Stäuben. 
 Erst wenn wir sicher sind, dass ein Produkt allen Anforderungen unseres Kunden genügt, verlässt es unser Haus. 
 Für die zerstörende Prüfung von Batteriezellen haben wir einen Batterieprüfstand entwickelt, der sich zur Absaugung der entstehenden Schadstoffe optimal zusammen mit unserem PRIMUS – all in one-Entstauber einsetzen lässt.

title: PRIMUS – all in one modular dust collection system
keyword_ai: {"keywords_english":{"3":"energy-efficient dust collector","2":"HEPA filter EFC","1":"modular dust collection system"},"keywords":{"3":"energieeffizienter Staubsammler","2":"HEPA-Filter EFC","1":"modulares Staubsammelsystem"}}
description: The PRIMUS – all in one modular dust collection system offers greater flexibility for our customers thanks to a modular design. The air outlet can be operated either in exhaust air or in air recirculation mode, with M6 filters (meets ePM2.5 50% in accordance with ISO 16890) or HEPA filters (H14). Filter cleaning without compressed air is achieved through the innovative EFC system, which removes built-up dust from the filter elements almost completely and without noise, making them as good as new every time they are cleaned. The system performs the cleaning cycle automatically as dust builds up on the filter elements. The sound pressure level of the dust collector is 60 dB(A), with no additional sound insulation! This is due to consciously designed air flow through the system. An optional rotary feeder with a large storage container is designed specifically for handling toxic and very fine dust, conveying the dust through the feeder into a tightly sealable standard storage container. The air flow rate can be increased from 3,000 m³/h to 6,000 m³/h or even 9,000 m³/h at operating pressure without increasing the raw gas volume, providing inherent safety advantages. Our control technology makes it possible to keep the set flow rate constant, regardless of whether dust has built up on the filter elements or HEPA filters have been retrofitted. The PRIMUS – all in one system provides unparalleled energy efficiency, with only 2.2 kW required for achieving an air flow of 3,000 m³/h at operating pressure. Filter ruptures are a thing of the past, and housings protect the filter elements from damage and wear, minimizing costs. The comparatively low energy consumption alone makes the PRIMUS – all in one series an environmentally friendly dust collection option. Additional benefits are the long service life of all components and the fact that the problematic use of water and pesticides is no longer necessary. The PRIMUS – all in one operates at a very low noise level, so there is no need for external sound insulation.

title: REXOFIL Primus Dust Collector
keyword_ai: {"keywords_english":{"3":"remote maintenance","2":"dust collector","1":"REXOFIL Primus"},"keywords":{"3":"remote maintenance","2":"dust collector","1":"REXOFIL Primus"}}
description:
Keeping tabs on everything with remote maintenance (via network or GSM connection) 
 We continuously measure all relevant parameters of the dust collection system and save them to a memory card. 
 All the data can be read out on the display or through remote maintenance. The dust collector’s entire history can thus be analyzed at any time. 
 This allows easy servicing at low cost to you and us. 
 The compact design makes all parts of the system easily accessible for maintenance, so costs are much less than for conventional dust collection systems. 
 It goes without saying that we also provide affordable maintenance contracts.
